testcase.name: should log in as my test user and validate my status message
should create a new post and validate the post appears in the feed
should update the status headline and verify the change
should add the user "Follower" to the list of followed users and verify the count increases by one
should remove the user "Follower" from the list of followed users and verify the count decreases by one
should search for "Only One Post Like This" and verify only one post shows, and verify the author
should update the user's email and verify
should update the user's zipcode and verify
should update the user's password, verify a "will not change" message is returned
